org.apache.river.test.spec.javaspace.conformance

Class ParticipantImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.test.spec.javaspace.conformance.ParticipantImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Remote, net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionConstants, net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionParticipant, net.jini.security.proxytrust.ServerProxyTrust

    public class ParticipantImpl
extends Object
implements net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionParticipant, net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionConstants, net.jini.security.proxytrust.ServerProxyTrust, Serializable
    This class is needed to prevent normal committing operation.
    Author:
    Mikhail A. Markov
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void abort(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager mgr, long id)
      Requests that the participant roll back any changes for the specified transaction and unlock any resources locked by the transaction.
      void commit(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager mgr, long id)
      Requests that the participant make all of its PREPARED changes for the specified transaction visible outside of the transaction and unlock any resources locked by the transaction.

      Returns a TrustVerifier that can be used to verify that a proxy can be trusted as a proxy for the service; that is, the isTrustedObject method of the returned verifier can be called with a candidate proxy.

      Requests that the participant prepare itself to commit the transaction, and to vote on the outcome of the transaction.
      int prepareAndCommit(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager mgr, long id)

      • getProxyVerifier

        public net.jini.security.TrustVerifier getProxyVerifier()
        Description copied from interface: net.jini.security.proxytrust.ServerProxyTrust
        Returns a TrustVerifier that can be used to verify that a proxy can be trusted as a proxy for the service; that is, the isTrustedObject method of the returned verifier can be called with a candidate proxy. The verifier should be able to verify all proxies for the service, including proxies for resources (such as leases and registrations).
        Specified by:
        getProxyVerifier in interface net.jini.security.proxytrust.ServerProxyTrust
        Returns:
        a TrustVerifier that can be used to verify that a proxy can be trusted as a proxy for the service

      • prepareAndCommit

        public int prepareAndCommit(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager mgr,
                            long id)
                     throws net.jini.core.transaction.UnknownTransactionException,
                            RemoteException
        A combination of prepare and commit, which can be used by the manager when there is just one participant left to prepare and all other participants (if any) have responded with NOTCHANGED. This method is needed to implement TransactionParticipant interface. It always returns ABORTED to prevent normal committing operation.
        Specified by:
        prepareAndCommit in interface net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionParticipant
        Parameters:
        mgr - the manager of the transaction
        id - the transaction ID
        Returns:
        an int representing its state
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.transaction.UnknownTransactionException - if the transaction is unknown to the transaction manager, either because the transaction ID is incorrect or because the transaction is complete and its state has been discarded by the manager.
        RemoteException - if there is a communication error
        See Also:
        prepare(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager, long), commit(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager, long)

      • abort

        public void abort(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager mgr,
                  long id)
           throws net.jini.core.transaction.UnknownTransactionException,
                  RemoteException
        Requests that the participant roll back any changes for the specified transaction and unlock any resources locked by the transaction. All state associated with the transaction can then be discarded by the participant. This method is needed to implement TransactionParticipant interface. It is empty.
        Specified by:
        abort in interface net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionParticipant
        Parameters:
        mgr - the manager of the transaction
        id - the transaction ID
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.transaction.UnknownTransactionException - if the transaction is unknown to the transaction manager, either because the transaction ID is incorrect or because the transaction is complete and its state has been discarded by the manager.
        RemoteException - if there is a communication error

      • commit

        public void commit(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager mgr,
                   long id)
            throws net.jini.core.transaction.UnknownTransactionException,
                   RemoteException
        Requests that the participant make all of its PREPARED changes for the specified transaction visible outside of the transaction and unlock any resources locked by the transaction. This method is needed to implement TransactionParticipant interface. It is empty.
        Specified by:
        commit in interface net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionParticipant
        Parameters:
        mgr - the manager of the transaction
        id - the transaction ID
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.transaction.UnknownTransactionException - if the transaction is unknown to the transaction manager, either because the transaction ID is incorrect or because the transaction is complete and its state has been discarded by the manager.
        RemoteException - if there is a communication error

      • prepare

        public int prepare(net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionManager mgr,
                   long id)
            throws net.jini.core.transaction.UnknownTransactionException,
                   RemoteException
        Requests that the participant prepare itself to commit the transaction, and to vote on the outcome of the transaction. This method is needed to implement TransactionParticipant interface. It always returns ABORTED to prevent normal committing operation.
        Specified by:
        prepare in interface net.jini.core.transaction.server.TransactionParticipant
        Parameters:
        mgr - the manager of the transaction
        id - the transaction ID
        Returns:
        an int representing this participant's state
        Throws:
        net.jini.core.transaction.UnknownTransactionException - if the transaction is unknown to the transaction manager, either because the transaction ID is incorrect or because the transaction is complete and its state has been discarded by the manager.
        RemoteException - if there is a communication error
